name: BaseBalls.IO
description:
Tap to beat, release pressure!

Take your baseball bat, and hit the players off the stage!
Be careful! Don’t be bounced out of the stage!

Features:
1.No WI-FI, Offline game! Enjoy the game everywhere you feel tired!
2.One hand and easy to play!
3.Release pressure, and feel relax.
4.Choose your own bat and hat

How to play:
1. To drag 'Baseball' character;
2. Be careful not to fall into the water, the game will be over;
3.Dodge 'Baseball' character and hit it;
4.If there is only one in the 'Baseball Field', it wins;

We’re sure that you can not stop playing such games that will release your pressure!
